text: Knocked on my door thinking my roommate was in bed w her bf, walked in on her explaining the history of DHH (Desi Hip Hop) to him…

Bhai mujhe nhi pta kya hogya hai divine ke pen game ko fr
Homicide, Tequila dance, Dr.divine, Boom.
Ye tracks fir bhi better hai
Once upon a time in desi hip hop
Mashooriya on ideation and execution of one of the most ICONIC rollouts of Desi Hip Hop for Mr. Sharmeeli.
Seedhe maut has the best discography in desi hip hop!

One of the most talented and beloved female artists in the South will still not find space in a success poster, shoulder to shoulder with a man. 

Rowdy Baby was what it was also because of the trippy vocals of Dhee. 

Anyway.
Black day for Desi Hip Hop
